sections.title: Why Car Owners Trust duPont REGISTRY Logistics for Vehicle Transport
sections.content: At duPont REGISTRY Logistics, we understand that your vehicle is more than just transportation, it’s an investment, a passion, and a statement.
sections.secContent: Whether you’re relocating, purchasing a luxury car, attending an auto show, or shipping a vehicle to a collector, our premium auto transport service ensures a seamless and stress-free experience.

contentSet.title: Luxury Transport Experts
contentSet.content: With decades in the high-end automotive industry, we specialize in handling exotic, collector, and luxury vehicles with the care they deserve.

contentSet.title: Trusted Network
contentSet.content: We partner only with vetted, top-tier carriers to ensure your vehicle is in the best hands from pickup to delivery.

contentSet.title: Comprehensive Services
contentSet.content: Choose from enclosed transport for added protection, expedited shipping for time-sensitive needs, and door-to-door delivery for the ultimate convenience.

customers.name: Sarah L., New York to Miami
customers.review: I used DR Logistics to ship my Ferrari 488 spider from NYC to Miami. It arrived in perfect condition and ahead of schedule. The level of care and professionalism was beyond my expectations. Highly Recommend!

customers.name: John D., Philadelphia to Orange County
customers.review: I sold my G63 Mansory to a friend in CA. I used duPont Logistics for the cross-country shipping. They handled everything flawlessly.

customers.name: Exotic Car Dealership, CA
customers.review: Having a logistics partner that is both reliable and transparent has been a game changer for our dealership. Our customers expect premium service, and duPont Logistics delivers.

howItWorks.title: How It Works – Seamless Auto Transport for Your Dealership

steps.title: Step 1: Get a Personalized Quote
steps.content: Provide details about your vehicle, pickup, and delivery locations. Choose between open or enclosed transport, set your pickup date, and let our experts handle the details. Receive a transparent, competitive quote tailored to your shipping needs.

steps.title: Step 2: Book with Confidence
steps.content: Finalize your quote and schedule transport effortlessly.

steps.title: Step 3: Secure Pickup & White-Glove Delivery
steps.content: Our professional carriers ensure timely pickup and safe delivery, whether to your new home, a showroom, or an auction. We handle every detail with expert precision and care.

items.question: What are my responsibilities during vehicle inspections?
items.answer:
You or your delegate must inspect the vehicle with the driver at both pick-up and delivery.
Document any damages and the odometer reading on the Bill of Lading and retain a signed copy for your records.

items.question: What contact information should I provide?
items.answer:
Provide valid phone numbers and email addresses for the person available during loading and delivery.
They must be an adult with a valid driver's license.

items.question: Will my vehicle be picked up and delivered to my door?
items.answer:
We aim for door-to-door service, but if the truck cannot reach your door, we may ask to meet in a nearby parking lot for safety.
Notify us if that’s not possible.

items.question: What documents and items must I provide at pickup and delivery?
items.answer:
You or your representative must be present to sign the condition report and provide one complete set of keys, including any for locked compartments.
Remove personal accessories from the keys.

items.question: How should I prepare my vehicle’s gas level?
items.answer: Ensure your gas level is between 1/8 to 1/4 tank before transport.

items.question: How do I prepare my vehicle for transport?
items.answer:
Check antifreeze, battery, fluids, and tire pressure.
Ensure the emergency brake works.
Remove spare tire covers, grill covers, bedliners, and other car covers.

items.question: Are there any minimum vehicle requirements?
items.answer:
The vehicle must be free of personal items, operable, and free of leaks.
The driver’s door, window, and emergency brake must work.
Provide any special starting instructions.

items.question: How do I protect my vehicle from loss or damage?
items.answer:
Lower/remove the antenna, fold mirrors, remove interior valuables, and ensure the vehicle is clean.
For convertibles, lock the top securely.
You may remove license plates.

items.question: Are there safety considerations I should know?
items.answer:
Inform us of any modifications.
Vehicles must be under 7 feet tall with at least 4 inches of ground clearance.
Remove detachable aftermarket accessories and truck bed shells not permanently affixed.
